subject: Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant scored 44 points, passing Jerry West as the Los Angeles Lakers’ career scoring leader, but the Memphis Grizzlies beat the Lakers, 95-93, on Monday night.
snippet: Kobe Bryant scored 44 points, passing Jerry West as the Los Angeles Lakers’ career scoring leader, but the Memphis Grizzlies beat the Lakers, 95-93, on Monday night.
